Dexweb builds you a dex to put on the web. This Python library generate a website from PDF, Powerpoint, text, and JSON files.

```bash
pip install dexweb
```

See usage.py on [GitHub](https://github.com/matrixdex/devpy) to make The Matrix Dex.



Dependencies:

- PyPDF2==0.29.0
